info.name: Enrico Service
info.description:
Enrico Service is a free service providing public holidays for several countries. You can use Enrico Service to display public holidays on your website or in your desktop application written in any programming language. Enrico Service is an open-source software  so you can study, contribute, change or use it. See Enrico source code on [Github](https://github.com/jurajmajer/enrico).

Contact Support:
 Email: enrico@kayaposoft.com

request.description: Returns the list of supported countries

query.description: (Required) Month to return holidays for (1 - January, 2 - February, ..., 12 - December)
(Required) Year to return holidays for

(Required) [ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code](https://github.com/jurajmajer/enrico) or [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2). To get supported countries, see operation `GET /getSupportedCountries`
Region in the country to return holidays for. Not all countries have region defined. See operation `GET /getSupportedCountries`
Type of holidays to be returned

request.description: Returns holidays for given month in given country

query.description: (Required) Year to return holidays for

Region in the country to return holidays for. Not all countries have region defined. See operation `GET /getSupportedCountries`
Type of holidays to be returned

request.description: Returns holidays for given year in given country

Region in the country to return holidays for. Not all countries have region defined. See operation `GET /getSupportedCountries`
Type of holidays to be returned
